meanings.definition: The quality or state of being universal.
meanings.sent1: The universalness of kindness is evident in every act of generosity.
meanings.sent2: The idea of universalness in mathematics allows for consistent solutions across different problems.
meanings.sent3: The universalness of laughter brings people together in joyous harmony.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had a universalness that could brighten even the darkest days.
meanings.sent5: The universalness of love knows no boundaries and transcends all differences.

meanings.definition: The property of being applicable to all cases or situations.
meanings.sent1: The universalness of the rule made it easy to apply in any scenario.
meanings.sent2: The principle of universalness in science ensures that experiments yield consistent results.
meanings.sent3: The universalness of the recipe made it a favorite among chefs of all levels.
meanings.sent4: His advice had a universalness that resonated with everyone who sought his guidance.
meanings.sent5: The universalness of the solution simplified the complex problem for all to understand.

meanings.definition: The concept of being present everywhere or involving everyone.
meanings.sent1: The universalness of music can be felt in every corner of the world.
meanings.sent2: The idea of universalness in spirituality connects individuals from diverse backgrounds.
meanings.sent3: The universalness of the party invitation ensured a full house of guests.
meanings.sent4: Her influence had a universalness that reached people across continents.
meanings.sent5: The universalness of the message spread rapidly through social media platforms.
